Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman hit a walk-off grand slam with two outs to turn a one-run deficit into a three-run victory in Game 1
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees won the AL East, then took down the Kansas City Royals in the ALDS and the Cleveland Guardians in the ALCS
The Dodgers won the NL West, then beat the San Diego Padres in the NLDS and the New York Mets in the NLCS
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees broke out in Game 4 to force a Game 5 Wednesday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers took Game 1 in 10 innings
Game 2 was another Los Angeles win, thanks to three home runs and an excellent start by Yoshinobu Yamamoto
The Dodgers took Game 3 as well
This is the Yankees' first Fall Classic since 2009
The Dodgers have made the World Series four times since 2017, winning it all in the pandemic-shortened 2020 season
Others: The World Series schedule for the Dodgers vs. the Yankees is as follows: Game 1 (Fri., Oct. 25), Game 2 (Sat., Oct. 26), Game 3 (Mon., Oct. 28), Game 4 (Tues., Oct. 29), Game 5 (if necessary) (Weds., Oct. 30), Game 6 (if necessary) (Fri., Nov. 1), Game 7 (if necessary) (Sat., Nov. 2)
